903d0ad8-5285-4a3a-aca8-0cdc5657750c.name: create oneliner for quick db-dump
903d0ad8-5285-4a3a-aca8-0cdc5657750c.description:
The following one-liner ... + quick definition for the db backup dirs :Â 

pg_dump -d $postgres_db_name -U ysg > $mix_data_dir/sql/pgsql/dbdumps/$postgres_db_name/$postgres_db_name.`date "+%Y%m%d_%H%M%S"`.dmp.sql


ls -1 dat/sql/pgsql/dbdumps/$postgres_db_name/*.sql |sortÂ 
# dat/sql/pgsql/dbdumps/dev_issue_tracker/dev_issue_tracker.20180807_182659.dmp.sql # dat/sql/pgsql/dbdumps/dev_issue_tracker/dev_issue_tracker.20180807_183107.dmp.sql
